Title: cDevWorkflow
Description: cDevWorkflow is a next generation Workflow-BPM product for .net developers
HomeWiki:
Project Description
cDevWorkflow is a next generation Workflow-BPM product for .net developers


cDevWorkflow provides the following Workflow-BPM features
*Graphical web based drag and drop designer
*High performance workflow engine
*Engine supports distributed processing and fail-over processing
*Enterprise Service bus for processing events
*Business intelligence dashboard
*Full .Net API and Web-service API
*Build and use your own custom steps uisng .net
*Supports .net framework 4.0+
*Runs on Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, Oracle databases

For more information visit www.cDevWorkflow.com http://www.cDevWorkflow.com
